TextBlock.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: I have prepared the socket for the new <color=orange>Advanced Warp Core</color> here in the engine room.
Once it's finished I'll be ready to take the train on its inaugural warp back to my clan!

After placing the <color=orange>Advanced Warp Core</color>, the <color=orange>Coordinate Interface</color> will rise up from the floor. All I need to do is enter the correct coordinates from the <color=orange>Coordinate Relay</color> and we're off!
